sentences.en: A large stash of drugs had been found aboard the yacht.
sentences.cn: 在游艇上发现了大量藏匿的毒品。

sentences.en: Police discovered a large stash of drugs while searching the house.
sentences.cn: 警方搜查这栋房子时发现里面藏有一大批毒品。

sentences.en: Select the option to stash the password to a file.
sentences.cn: 选择将密码隐藏在在文件中的选项。
